effect.name: OvineLens
effect.description:
Apply the lens effect of the supplied image to the object (white = magnified, black = normal size)
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:55
effect.author: Looki - Modified by AndyH@Ovine.net

parameter.name: Lens
parameter.description: The lens map to use to distort the object, whiter areas are magnified
